title: Fire bows/Punch bows to Justice and Senex

replies.body: I often archer tower on Justice and the bows are too op.

replies.body: Fire bows are less impactful then before the removal from Senex 1, but yea Punch bows are broken.

replies.body: punch/fire bows should never be a thing, they're always too op, but they are great for knowing who uses reduced kb
